document_data.mainbody:
Sheela Peryroyl (Pronounce|SHEE|lah|_|PAIR|re|royl|refs=) was the halfling goddess of nature, song, dance, agriculture, and romantic love. In the period between the Spellplague and the Second Sundering, during which Yondalla was interpreted as an aspect of Chauntea, Sheela was considered the prominent halfling deity.
thumb|The holy symbol of Sheela Peryroyl.
